backup_reason: Database schema sync - removing obsolete tables and columns

notes.session_table: The session table is managed by connect-pg-simple and should remain outside of Drizzle ORM control. It will be preserved automatically.
notes.docuseal_required_templates: This is an obsolete table. The new docuseal_templates table has a different structure and purpose. These records were not migrated as they don't map to the new schema.
notes.form_submissions_columns: These columns (reminder_count, error_message, webhook_events) were removed as they contained minimal data and are no longer used.
